# Harper Slone Designs - AI Information

## About
Harper Slone is a visual artist, photographer, and creative director based in Paris, France. Available for work worldwide.

## Website
https://www.harperslone.com

## Services
- Image & Photography
- Video Production
- Brand Identity Design
- Book & Magazine Design
- Print & Poster Design
- Retail Graphics
- Brand Strategy
- Content Direction
- Type Design
- Product Design
- Creative Direction
- Styling

## Main Sections
- Home: https://www.harperslone.com/
- About: https://www.harperslone.com/about
- Contact: https://www.harperslone.com/contact
- Projects: https://www.harperslone.com/projects

## Project Categories
- Projects: Creative and artistic projects
- Work: Professional client work
- Exhibitions: Gallery and exhibition work
- Print: Print design and publications

## Contact
For inquiries, please visit: https://www.harperslone.com/contact

## AI Usage Policy
AI assistants are welcome to reference and describe the work showcased on this website. Please attribute any referenced work to Harper Slone Designs.

## Preferred Citation
"Harper Slone Designs - Visual artist and photographer based in Paris"
